mapper.select: select count(*) from TBL_MEMBER where userid = #{userid}
select userid , pwd , name , nickname , mobile , profile_image , resume_count from tbl_member where userid = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member ( userid , pwd , name , nickname , mobile , profile_image , resume_count ) values ( #{userid} , #{pwd} , #{name} , #{nickname} , #{mobile} , 'profile_default.png' , 0 )
mapper.select: select COMPANY_ID , SERIAL_NO , FK_REGION_DETAIL_CODE , PWD , NAME , DETAILS , EMP_COUNT , IMAGE , ADDRESSS , COMPANY_CODE from tbl_company where company_id = #{userid}

select post_code , fk_company_id , fk_duty_code , career , subject , info , image , createday , salary , mainduty, quality , deadline ,viewcount, pay_status from tbl_post where post_code = #{post_code}

select C.company_id , C.name , C.details ,C.EMP_COUNT , C.ADDRESSS , C.IMAGE , R.REGION_NAME , D.REGION_DETAIL_NAME from ( select post_code , fk_company_id , subject from tbl_post where post_code = #{post_code} )P join tbl_company C ON P.fk_company_id = C.COMPANY_ID join tbl_region_detail D ON C.FK_REGION_DETAIL_CODE = D.REGION_DETAIL_CODE JOIN TBL_REGION R ON D.FK_REGION_CODE = R.REGION_CODE
select image_name , fk_company_id from tbl_detail_image where fk_company_id = #{company_id}
